metadata.name: WMI Event Consumer Created Named Pipe
metadata.comment: Detects the WMI Event Consumer service scrcons.exe creating a named pipe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\scrcons.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the WMI Event Consumer service scrcons.exe creating a named pipe
